CustomField.description: This date is used to send Chatter Posts. Added per Case 25358948
CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( Date_Survey_Sent__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 3, Date_Survey_Sent__c + 2 + 3, 4, Date_Survey_Sent__c + 2 + 3, 5, Date_Survey_Sent__c + 2 + 3, 6, Date_Survey_Sent__c + 1 + 3, Date_Survey_Sent__c + 3 )
CustomField.label: Date Survey Sent plus 3 Business Days
